MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G3 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.47pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault, and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:29pm on Sunday, 21 February 2021
